001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.paper;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.calibre.core.Projectile;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Ticks;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.bounds.Bound;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.Task;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
009import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.serializers.BasicBoundSerializer;
010import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector2;
011import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
012import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.PaperUtils;
013import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.effect.PaperEffectors;
014import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.plugin.BasePlugin;
015import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.raycast.PaperRaycast;
016import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.scheduler.PaperScheduler;
017import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
018import org.bukkit.*;
019import org.bukkit.block.Block;
020import org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity;
021import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
022import org.bukkit.event.EventHandler;
023import org.bukkit.event.Listener;
024import org.bukkit.event.block.Action;
025import org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent;
026import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
027import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper;
028import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.TypeSerializerCollection;
029
030import java.text.DecimalFormat;
031import java.text.DecimalFormatSymbols;
032import java.util.*;
033import java.util.function.Predicate;
034
035public final class CalibrePlugin extends BasePlugin<CalibrePlugin> {
036    private static final Map<Locale, DecimalFormat> DECIMAL_FORMATS = new HashMap<>();
037
038    private final PaperScheduler scheduler = new PaperScheduler(this);
039    private final PaperEffectors effectors = new PaperEffectors(this);
040    private final Map<Player, PlayerData> playerData = new HashMap<>();
041    private final Explosions explosions = new Explosions(this);
042    private final Penetration penetration = new Penetration(this);
043    private final Raycasts raycasts = new Raycasts(this);
044
045    public PaperScheduler scheduler() { return scheduler; }
046    public PaperEffectors effectors() { return effectors; }
047    public Explosions explosions() { return explosions; }
048    public Penetration penetration() { return penetration; }
049    public Raycasts raycasts() { return raycasts; }
050
051    public PlayerData playerData(Player player) {
052        return playerData.computeIfAbsent(player, k -> new PlayerData(this, k));
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public void onEnable() {
057        super.onEnable();
058
059        scheduler.run(Task.repeating(ctx -> {
060            var iter = playerData.entrySet().iterator();
061            while (iter.hasNext()) {
062                var entry = iter.next();
063                if (entry.getKey().isValid()) {
064                    ctx.run(Task.single(entry.getValue()::tick));
065                } else
066                    iter.remove();
067            }
068        }, Ticks.MSPT));
069
070        Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new Listener() {
071            /*
072                5.56x45mm Bullet:
073                  v = 900m/s
074                  m = 4g = 0.004kg
075                  diameter = 5.70mm = 0.0057m
076                  radius = 0.00285m
077                  cross section = πr^2 = 2.5517586328783095e-05
078                    = 0.000025517m^2
079                  ρ = 1.225kg/m^3
080
081                  Cd = 0.06 (https://sites.google.com/site/technicalarchery/technical-discussions-1/drag-coefficients-of-bullets-arrows-and-spears)
082
083                  F = ((1.225 x Cd x 2.552e-05) / 2) * 900^2
084                   -> 0.30386664
085
086                  a = F / m = 0.30386664 / 0.004
087                   -> 75.96666m/s^2
088                   -> 3.798m/t^2
089                 */
090
091            record PaperFluid(double density, Material material) implements Projectile.Fluid<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> {
092                @Override
093                public String toString() {
094                    return "[μ=" + density + ":" + material.key().value() + "]";
095                }
096
097                @Override
098                public boolean isOf(PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable hit) {
099                    return hit.block() != null && hit.block().getType() == material;
100                }
101            }
102
103            PaperFluid air = new PaperFluid(1.225, Material.AIR);
104            Map<Material, PaperFluid> fluids = ImmutableMap.<Material, PaperFluid>builder()
105                .put(Material.WATER, new PaperFluid(997, Material.WATER))
106                .put(Material.LAVA, new PaperFluid(2500, Material.LAVA))
107                .build();
108
109            Optional<PaperFluid> optFluid(Block block) {
110                return Optional.ofNullable(fluids.get(block.getType()));
111            }
112
113            @EventHandler
114            void onEvent(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
115                if (event.getAction() == Action.LEFT_CLICK_AIR) {
116                    Player player = event.getPlayer();
117                    World world = player.getWorld();
118                    Location eye = player.getEyeLocation();
119                    Vector3 pos = PaperUtils.toCommons(eye);
120                    Vector3 dir = PaperUtils.toCommons(eye.getDirection());
121
122                    PaperRaycast.Options options = new PaperRaycast.Options(
123                        new PaperRaycast.Options.OfBlock(false, false, null),
124                        new PaperRaycast.Options.OfEntity(null)
125                    );
126                    Projectile<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable, PaperFluid> projectile = new Projectile<>(
127                        raycasts.build(options, world), pos, dir.multiply(50), Projectile.GRAVITY, optFluid(eye.getBlock()).orElse(air)
128                    ) {
129                        @Override
130                        protected Predicate<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> castTest() {
131                            return b -> b.entity() == null || b.entity() != player;
132                        }
133
134                        @Override
135                        protected @Nullable PaperFluid fluidOf(Raycast.Result<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> ray, Raycast.Hit<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> hit) {
136                            if (hit.hit().block() == null)
137                                return null;
138                            return optFluid(hit.hit().block()).orElse(null);
139                        }
140
141                        @Override
142                        protected double dragCoeff() { return 0.06; }
143
144                        @Override
145                        protected double dragArea() { return 2.55e-5; }
146
147                        @Override
148                        protected double mass() { return 0.004; }
149
150                        @Override
151                        protected double changeFluid(TaskContext ctx, double sec, double maxDistance, Raycast.Result<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> ray, Raycast.Hit<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> hit, PaperFluid oldFluid, PaperFluid newFluid) {
152                            Location location = PaperUtils.toPaper(ray.pos(), world);
153                            if (
154                                newFluid.material == Material.WATER ^ oldFluid.material == Material.WATER
155                            ) {
156                                player.spawnParticle(Particle.WATER_SPLASH, location, 16);
157                                player.spawnParticle(Particle.WATER_BUBBLE, location, 4);
158                                player.playSound(location, Sound.ENTITY_GENERIC_SPLASH, 1f, 1f);
159                            }
160                            return super.changeFluid(ctx, sec, maxDistance, ray, hit, oldFluid, newFluid);
161                        }
162
163                        @Override
164                        protected double step(TaskContext ctx, double sec) {
165                            if (!new Location(world, position.x(), position.y(), position.z()).isChunkLoaded()) {
166                                ctx.cancel();
167                                return 0;
168                            }
169
170                            Vector3 origin = position;
171                            double res = super.step(ctx, sec);
172                            Vector3 direction = position.subtract(origin);
173                            double distance = direction.length();
174                            direction = direction.divide(distance);
175                            for (double d = 0; d < distance; d += 3) {
176                                player.spawnParticle(Particle.FLAME, PaperUtils.toPaper(origin.add(direction.multiply(d)), world), 0);
177                            }
178                            return res;
179                        }
180
181                        /*@Override
182                        protected double hardness(PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable hit) {
183                            return hit.map(block -> penetration.hardness(block.getBlockData()), entity -> 0d); // todo hard
184                        }
185
186                        @Override
187                        protected double penetration() {
188                            return 10;
189                        }
190
191                        @Override
192                        protected Vector2 penetrationDeflect() {
193                            return Vector2.vec2(0.05);
194                        }
195
196                        @Override
197                        protected double deflectThreshold() {
198                            return 0.5;
199                        }
200
201                        @Override
202                        protected void tick0(TaskContext ctx, double sec) {
203                            Vector3 origin = position;
204                            Vector3 direction = direction();
205                            double distance = travelled();
206
207                            super.tick0(ctx, sec);
208
209                            distance = travelled() - distance;
210                            for (double d = 0; d < distance; d += 3) {
211                                player.spawnParticle(Particle.FLAME, PaperUtils.toPaper(origin.add(direction.multiply(d)), world), 0);
212                            }
213                        }
214
215                        @Override
216                        protected double step(TaskContext ctx, double remaining) {
217                            if (!new Location(world, position.x(), position.y(), position.z()).isChunkLoaded()) {
218                                ctx.cancel();
219                                return 0;
220                            }
221                            return super.step(ctx, remaining);
222                        }
223
224                        @Override
225                        protected boolean changeMedium(StepContext ctx, Raycast.Result<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> ray, Raycast.Hit<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> hit, Vector3 position, PaperFluid oldMedium, PaperFluid newMedium) {
226                            Location location = PaperUtils.toPaper(position, world);
227                            world.spawnParticle(Particle.END_ROD, location, 0);
228
229                            if (
230                                newMedium.block != null
231                                && oldMedium.hasWater() != newMedium.hasWater()
232                                && !newMedium.block.getMaterial().isCollidable()
233                            ) {
234                                world.spawnParticle(Particle.WATER_SPLASH, location, 16);
235                                world.spawnParticle(Particle.WATER_BUBBLE, location, 4, 0.05, 0, 0.05, 0);
236                                world.playSound(location, Sound.ENTITY_GENERIC_SPLASH, 1f, 1f);
237                            }
238
239                            return super.changeMedium(ctx, ray, hit, position, oldMedium, newMedium);
240                        }*/
241                    };
242                    scheduler.run(Task.repeating(projectile::tick, Ticks.MSPT));
243                } else {
244                    scheduler.cancel();
245                }
246            }
247        }, this);
248    }
249
250    public void damage(LivingEntity entity, double damage, @Nullable LivingEntity source) {
251        if (entity == source)
252            entity.damage(damage);
253        else
254            entity.damage(damage, source);
255    }
256
257    @Override
258    protected void configOptionsDefaults(TypeSerializerCollection.Builder serializers, ObjectMapper.Factory.Builder mapperFactory) {
259        super.configOptionsDefaults(serializers, mapperFactory);
260        serializers
261            .registerExact(Bound.class, BasicBoundSerializer.INSTANCE);
262    }
263
264    @Override
265    public void load() {
266        super.load();
267        explosions.load();
268        penetration.load();
269        raycasts.load();
270        for (var data : playerData.values()) {
271            data.load();
272        }
273    }
274
275    @Override
276    protected CalibreCommand createCommand() throws Exception {
277        return new CalibreCommand(this);
278    }
279
280    public static String format2(Locale locale, double value) {
281        DecimalFormat format = DECIMAL_FORMATS.computeIfAbsent(locale, k -> new DecimalFormat("0.##", DecimalFormatSymbols.getInstance(k)));
282        return format.format(value);
283    }
284
285    public static String format2Raw(Locale locale, double value) {
286        return String.format(locale, "%.2f", value);
287    }
288}
